channel.title: Game crashes to desktop when climbing stairwell in office complex
channel.description: Bug as in title. Can't find any references to this issue online. No issues playing any other games and hardware passes all stress tests. Starting a new game at this save point results in the same issue. PC specs: Windows 8.1 Pro Intel Core i5-4690 Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 (EVGA Superclocked ACX 2.0) 16 GB DDR3-1600 crash_bms.exe_20150616183909_1.dmp.zip (35.8 KB)
